title: Tridents
content: 1d8 (1d6) +1 Piercing Weapon Enchantment +1 The Water Caller: On a hit, create a 2m water surface centered around the target. Rush Attack Piercing Strike Nyrulna 1d8 (1d6) +3 Piercing Weapon Enchantment +3 Zephyr Connection: This weapon will return to your hand when thrown. You cannot be forced to drop the trident.
